net.floodlightcontroller.util

类 OFMessageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.OFMessageUtils

  • public class OFMessageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Tools to help work with OFMessages. Compare OFMessage-extending objects (e.g. OFFlowMod, OFPacketIn) where the XID does not matter. This is especially useful for unit testing where the XID of the OFMessage might vary whereas the expected OFMessgae must have a set XID.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  OFMessageUtils.OFMessageIgnoreXid
      Simple class to streamline the use of OFMessage's equalsIgnoreXid() and hashCodeIgnoreXid() functions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInPort

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort getInPort(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi)
        Get the ingress port of a packet-in message. The manner in which this is done depends on the OpenFlow version. OF1.0 and 1.1 have a specific in_port field, while OF1.2+ store this information in the packet-in's match field.
        参数:
        pi, - the OFPacketIn
        返回:
        the ingress OFPort

      • setInPort

        public static void setInPort(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketOut.Builder pob,
                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort in)
        Set the ingress port of a packet-out message. The manner in which this is done depends on the OpenFlow version. OF1.0 thru 1.4 have a specific in_port field, while OF1.5+ store this information in the packet-out's match field.
        参数:
        pob, - the OFPacketOut.Builder within which to set the in port
        in, - the ingress OFPort

      • getVlan

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFVlanVidMatch getVlan(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi)
        Get the VLAN on which this packet-in message was received.
        参数:
        pi, - the OFPacketIn
        返回:
        the VLAN

      • writePacketOutForPacketIn

        public static void writePacketOutForPacketIn(IOFSwitch sw,
                                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn packetInMessage,
                                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort egressPort)
        Writes an OFPacketOut message to a switch.
        参数:
        sw - The switch to write the PacketOut to.
        packetInMessage - The corresponding PacketIn.
        egressPort - The switchport to output the PacketOut.

        public static boolean isReplyForRequest(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage request,
